channel.title: Notes on craneppeakare
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on craneppeakare

item.title: Reporting Bug Template
item.description: This holds a basic template and guide for building bug reports that can be filled out quickly. Title: Severity: Informational: no real current security impact Low: Business impact is low Medium: Potential to cause harm to users but not revealing data High: Potential to reveal customer data or aids in exploitation of other vulnerabilities Critical: High risk of personal/confidential data exposure, general system compromise, and other severe impacts to business Description: Short description of said vulnerability

item.title: Networking
item.description: Tools ping traceroute whois dig (manually query recursive DNS servers of our choice for information about domains) TCP/IP Model Abstraction model for understanding the different stages of networking. Contains 7 layers of abstraction, each on built on top of the next. Layer 5: Application + ---------- + ------------- + | | | | L5 | Data (Data) | | Header | | | | | + ---------- + ------------- + Tries to establish a connection to the recieving computer across a network.
